attributes.action: Hidden payments are unfair for many causing account overdrawn and cause hardship
attributes.additional_details:
I have had some HIDDEN automatic payments taken before causing me to be overdrawn.
You're unable to STOP them until the damage has been done.
Made to benefit Business NOT the Consumer with the SNEAKY way you are NOT aware it's going to Automatic Renew.
How DARE you take OUR money without Permission.

rejection.details:

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken.
